scripts.generate:bundle: npm run generate:bundle:css && npm run generate:bundle:js
scripts.build-all:css: npm run generate:bundle:css && vite build --config vite.config.build.css.ts --mode development
scripts.build-all:js: npm run generate:bundle:js  && vite build --config vite.config.build.js.ts  --mode development
scripts.build-prod:css: npm run generate:bundle:css && vite build --config vite.config.build.css.ts --mode production
scripts.build-prod:js: npm run generate:bundle:js  && vite build --config vite.config.build.js.ts --mode production
scripts.build-all: npm run build-all:js && npm run build-all:css
scripts.build-all-prod: npm run generate:bundle && vite build --config vite.config.build.ts --mode production
scripts.generate:proj: npm run generate:proj:css && npm run generate:proj:js
scripts.build:css: npm run generate:proj:css && node scripts/component-build-css.js --mode development
scripts.build:js: npm run generate:proj:js && node scripts/component-build-js.js --mode development
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
